title: NZXT N7 Z590 Matte White Intel 11th and 10th Gen ATX Wi-Fi Gaming Motherboard
product_list_short_description: Intel Socket LGA1200 for 10th and 11th Generation Processors
Supports memory overclocking up to 4266 MHz
cat_seo_title: NZXT Intel Motherboard Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy NZXT Intel Motherboard at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest NZXT Intel 11th & 10th Gen Motherboard available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery in BD.
product_page_short_description: Intel Socket LGA1200 for 10th and 11th Generation Processors
Supports memory overclocking up to 4266 MHz
full_description:
NZXT N7 Z590 Matte White Intel 11th and 10th Gen ATX Wi-Fi Gaming Motherboard

The NZXT N7 Z590 Matte White motherboard enables a visually seamless backdrop for any build with all the features of the new Intel Z590 chipset. It is compatible with Intel Socket LGA1200 for Intel 11th Generation Core i9, Core i7, Core i5, and Core i3 processors. It has a 12+2 DrMOS Power Phase Design. It supports memory overclocking up to 4266 MHz and Intel XMP 2.0. The NZXT N7 Z590 is equipped with Intel Wifi 6E wireless connectivity and Bluetooth V5.2. It is Intel Optane Memory Ready and it has two M.2 connectors for storage devices. It is supported with Multi-GPU support with AMD CrossFireX Technology. It offers Digital RGB lighting control through NZXT CAM. Digital fan control for fan profiles within NZXT CAM for seven independent fan channels. It features an Integrated rear I/O shield and an efficient layout. It features 8-channel high-definition audio. The NZXT N7 Z590 Matte White comes with 3 years of warranty.

values.value: Intel Socket LGA1200 for 10th and 11th Generation Processors
1x PCIe x16 (x16 mode) (11th Gen CPUs - PCIe 4.0, 10th Gen CPUs - PCIe 3.0)
Intel Xe Graphics (11th Gen CPUs) / UHD (10th Gen CPUs)
